name: Syrian father
description:
When an adult dies, many things are lost to him, but when a child dies, everything ends.  The kites are gone.  Dreams do not form for tomorrow, the streets and houses are empty of excitement and noise.  "No one follows the butterflies."
This is a work of art from the "Before, War, After" collection, which was exhibited in 2011 at the Museum of Contemporary Art in Geneva, Switzerland. Actual size: 60 x 45 cm and digital size: 3060 x 3676 , oil on canvas.
